statements: SELECT * FROM air_quality_data;
SELECT sensor_id, area_name FROM air_quality_data;
SELECT area_name, pollution_level FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(pollution_level) AS max_pollution_level FROM air_quality_data;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT area_name, AVG(pollution_level) AS avg_pollution FROM air_quality_data GROUP BY area_name HAVING AVG(pollution_level) > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, area_name FROM air_quality_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-10 23:59:59' ORDER BY pollution_level DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM air_quality_data;
SELECT area_name, MAX(pollution_level) AS max_pollution_level, MIN(pollution_level) AS min_pollution_level FROM air_quality_data GROUP BY area_name;
SELECT * FROM pollution_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, area FROM pollution_data WHERE pollutant_level > 50
SELECT * FROM sensor_locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 40 AND 50
SELECT area, pollutant_level FROM pollution_data WHERE area = 'City A'
SELECT avg(pollutant_level) as avg_level, area FROM pollution_data GROUP BY area
SELECT * FROM pollution_data WHERE area = 'New York' ORDER BY pollutant_level DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, area, pollutant_type, MAX(pollutant_level) AS max_pollutant_level FROM pollution_data GROUP BY sensor_id, area, pollutant_type ORDER BY max_pollutant_level DESC;

SELECT s.sensor_id, s.area, s.pollutant_type, s.pollutant_level, l.latitude, l.longitude FROM pollution_data s JOIN sensor_locations l ON s.area = l.area WHERE s.pollutant_level > 100 ORDER BY s.pollutant_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM pollution_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND pollutant_type IN ('CO', 'Ozone') ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT area FROM pollution_data WHERE pollutant_type = 'PM2.5';
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM pollution_data WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_location = 'Room A' ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors JOIN pollution_data ON sensors.sensor_id = pollution_data.sensor_id WHERE pollution_level > 50 ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location_name FROM sensors JOIN locations ON sensors.sensor_location = locations.location_name WHERE latitude > 40 ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;

SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location, pollution_level FROM sensors JOIN pollution_data ON sensors.sensor_id = pollution_data.sensor_id JOIN locations ON sensors.sensor_location = locations.location_name WHERE longitude < -120 ORDER BY pollution_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_sensors ORDER BY measurement_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT area_name, pollution_level FROM air_quality_sensors WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT city_name, AVG(pollution_level) AS avg_pollution FROM areas JOIN pollution_levels ON areas.area_id = pollution_levels.area_id GROUP BY city_name;
SELECT * FROM pollution_levels WHERE measurement_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND pollution_level < 30 ORDER BY measurement_timestamp ASC;

SELECT city_name, COUNT(*) AS sensor_count FROM cities LEFT JOIN areas ON cities.city_name = areas.city_name LEFT JOIN air_quality_sensors ON areas.area_id = air_quality_sensors.area_id GROUP BY city_name ORDER BY sensor_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_sensors WHERE area_name = 'Central Park' LIMIT 10;
SELECT area_name, pollution_level FROM air_quality_sensors WHERE pollution_level > 50 ORDER BY measurement_timestamp DESC;
SELECT areas.area_name, cities.city_name FROM areas INNER JOIN cities ON areas.city_name = cities.city_name WHERE areas.area_name LIKE 'Downtown%' AND cities.country = 'USA';
SELECT area_name, AVG(pollution_level) AS avg_pollution FROM air_quality_sensors GROUP BY area_name HAVING avg_pollution > 60 ORDER BY avg_pollution DESC;

SELECT area_name, city_name, pollution_level, measurement_timestamp FROM air_quality_sensors AS a JOIN areas AS ar ON a.area_name = ar.area_name JOIN cities AS c ON ar.city_name = c.city_name WHERE a.pollution_level > 70 ORDER BY measurement_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT area_name, city FROM areas WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT reading_id, reading_value, reading_time FROM readings ORDER BY reading_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT city_name, country FROM cities JOIN countries ON cities.country = countries.country_name;
SELECT * FROM sensors
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, last_reading FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature'
SELECT area_id, AVG(pollution_level) AS avg_pollution FROM sensors GROUP BY area_id HAVING AVG(pollution_level) > 50

SELECT city, MAX(reading_value) AS max_reading FROM readings JOIN areas ON readings.sensor_id = areas.area_id JOIN cities ON areas.city = cities.city_name GROUP BY city HAVING MAX(reading_value) > 100

SELECT country_name, COUNT(*) AS num_sensors FROM sensors JOIN areas ON sensors.area_id = areas.area_id JOIN cities ON areas.city = cities.city_name JOIN countries ON cities.country = countries.country_name GROUP BY country_name
